explains: v. 乞讨，乞求；行乞（beg 的现在分词形式）
wordGroup: beg your pardon 对不起，请原谅
go begging vi. 行乞；销路极差
beg one's pardon 请某人再说一遍

sentences.en: Vagrancy and begging has become commonplace in the city.
sentences.cn: 流浪和乞讨在这个城市里已变得很常见。

sentences.en: The children were begging for food.
He was reduced to begging for a living.
